ART PUBLISHING AND CUSTOM PUBLISHING SERVICES

Assembly House: In-House Publishing

Assembly House is an innovative publisher specializing in beautifully produced books and catalogues devoted to contemporary arts and culture. With a broad spectrum of interests converging on the creative arts and living, Assembly House aims to deliver original and compelling content with an imaginative edge.

Our approach is based on collaboration, crossover and fostering connections inspiring high quality and unique books for an international market.
